parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 50. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used for the next query. Valid values:

- You do not need to specify this parameter for the first query.

- For a subsequent query, set this parameter to the NextToken value returned from the last API call.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

- **IPAM**: IPAM

- **IPAMSCOPE**: IPAM scope

- **IPAMPOOL**: IPAM address pool
